name: HTML5 Drag&Drop example application
body: This projects demonstrates how to use the new HTML5 Drag&Drop API, Javascript FileAPI and the XMLHTTPRequest 2 object to build a web application to drag&drop an image into the browser and load it on the server, providing feedback to the user about the upload status.
tagline: Proof of concept project to showcase HTML5 Drag&Drop feature
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
